step_feedback.feedback: Good job finding a comfortable position. Keep your hands on your abdomen as you start to inhale.
You're doing great with hand placement. Remember to keep your hands on your abdomen throughout the inhale.
Nice slow inhale through your nose! Try to tighten your whole body muscles a bit more as you breathe in, and visualize the fluid moving up.
Well done relaxing your muscles as you exhale through your mouth. Keep visualizing pushing that fluid out.
Great start to your second breath! Remember to place your hands on your abdomen for this step.
Hands are well-placed on your abdomen. Continue to focus on your breathing.
Excellent inhale through your nose. Try to engage your entire body muscles a little more strongly as you breathe in.
You're doing a fantastic job relaxing and exhaling through your mouth. Keep up the great visualization of fluid movement.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to keep your hands on your abdomen and focus on tightening your whole body muscles during the inhale, then relaxing completely on the exhale.
